ex.train
Interface SampleClassifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
CRFConnector, WekaConnector
public interface SampleClassifier

An interface to be implemented by external classifiers in order to be integrated into ex.

Method Summary

Method Detail

initEmptyDataSet

void initEmptyDataSet(DataSource src,
                      byte featureFilter)
Creates an empty dataset of samples with feature vector based on DataSource. If given, a filter will be set to prune unwanted features from being communicated to the classifier.

initEmptyDataSet

void initEmptyDataSet(uep.data.SampleSet src)
Prepares an empty dataset containing feature definitions from given SampleSet.

                byte featureFilter,

Adds all samples in SampleSet to the current dataset.

loadSamples

void loadSamples(java.lang.String dataFile,
                 boolean treatMissingValuesAsZero)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Loads samples from dataFile, replacing any previous content of the current data set.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

clearDataSet

void clearDataSet()
Clears the current dataset, keeps feature vector.

getFeatureCount

int getFeatureCount()
Returns the number of features used by the current dataset

getSampleCount

int getSampleCount()
Returns the number of samples in the current dataset. This does not take into account instance weights.

getWeightedSampleCount

double getWeightedSampleCount()
Returns the sum of weights of all instances.
